about_the_game:
The Arcana of Paradise ーThe Towerー Original Sound Track by Jun Fukuda, best known for his work on No More Heroes and Lolipop Chainsaw, features 32 wacky and melancholic tracks created specifically for this roguelike real-time card battler.

The album even includes the hauntingly beautiful vocal performances of Fumikou, Kristen Watts and Borjigin Cecegmaa in “Hatena no Uta” and "An Arcana's Lullaby", the game’s ending theme song. All Remastered specifically for stand-alone listening, this is one album you don’t want to miss!
